thread.section_title: TelephoneKenya.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TelephoneKenya.com | telephonekenya.com
thread.title: James Raymond

author: James Raymond
title: James Raymond
text: Fortunately, when I retired, I found TelephoneKenya.com on the internet while searching for a cheap way to call all my many kids and friends (about 20) in Kenya and Uganda from the USA. I have saved a ton of money so to speak and get to call them more often than I had expected. Calling 20 or so people in Africa at least 3 or 4 times a year and talking for awhile to each would be impossible for me to afford without TelephoneKenya.com. Also I can buy mobile airtime for them cheaply thru TelephoneKenya, it saves them money and they really appreciate it. I get to keep in touch with them, and touch them too. Can't ask for more than that.
